Token.Abstract: Initialize an empty Kinvey Store with the default options

ReturnValue.Abstract: An autoreleased empty store with default options and default authentication.

Token.Abstract: Initialize an empty store with the given options and the default authentication

Parameter.Name: options
Parameter.Abstract: A dictionary of options to configure the store.

ReturnValue.Abstract: An autoreleased empty store with configured options and default authentication.

Token.Abstract: Initialize an empty store with the given options and the given authentication

Parameter.Name: authHandler
Parameter.Abstract: The Kinvey Authentication Handler used to authenticate backend requests. Reserved for future use.

Parameter.Name: options
Parameter.Abstract: A dictionary of options to configure the store.

Token.Abstract: Add or update an object (or objects) in the store.

Parameter.Name: object
Parameter.Abstract: An object to add/update in the store (if the object is a NSArray, all objects will be added/updated)

Parameter.Name: completionBlock
Parameter.Abstract: A block that gets invoked when the addition/update is "complete" (as defined by the store

Parameter.Name: progressBlock
Parameter.Abstract: A block that is invoked whenever the store can offer an update on the progress of the operation.

Token.Abstract: Query or fetch an object (or objects) in the store.

Parameter.Name: query
Parameter.Abstract: A query to act on a store. The store defines the type of queries it accepts, an object of type [KCSQuery query] causes all objects to be returned.

Parameter.Name: completionBlock
Parameter.Abstract: A block that gets invoked when the query/fetch is "complete" (as defined by the store

Parameter.Name: progressBlock
Parameter.Abstract: A block that is invoked whenever the store can offer an update on the progress of the operation.

Token.Abstract: This is the general configuration routine for a Kinvey Store

Parameter.Name: options
Parameter.Abstract: A dictionary containing store specific options, see store documentation for details

ReturnValue.Abstract: A BOOL value indicating whether the options were accepted by the store.

Token.Abstract: Set the Kinvey Auth Handler for this store

Parameter.Name: handler
Parameter.Abstract: The Kinvey Auth Handler to be used during requests. @deprecatedIn 1.22.0

Token.Abstract: Get the currently set Kinvey Auth Handler for this Store

ReturnValue.Abstract: The currently set Kinvey Auth Handler. @deprecatedIn 1.22.0
